mapper.insert: insert into kq_planweek (pkid, UserGroupIDStr, Subject, BeginTime, EndTime, WeekNo, WeekOrder, SchoolID, SpaceID, teacherID) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usergroupidstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{weekno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spaceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update kq_planweek set UserGroupIDStr = #{usergroupidstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BeginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EndTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WeekNo = #{weekno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WeekOrder = #{weekorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SchoolID = #{schoolid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SpaceID = #{spaceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacherID = #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, UserGroupIDStr, Subject, BeginTime, EndTime, WeekNo, WeekOrder, SchoolID, SpaceID, teacherID from kq_planweek where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select pkid, UserGroupIDStr, Subject, BeginTime, EndTime, WeekNo, WeekOrder, SchoolID, SpaceID, teacherID from kq_planweek
